title: U.S. Rep. Thomas M. Davis, USGS Scientists to Brief Media on Mid-Atlantic Drought

und.value:
Media Advisory

WHO: U.S. Rep. Thomas M. Davis III (R-Va.) and scientists from the U.S. Geological Survey.

WHAT: Media briefing on current drought conditions in the Mid-Atlantic region including Virginia, Maryland, West Virginia, Pennsylvania, Delaware, New Jersey and New York.

WHEN: Monday, August 2, 1999, 2 p.m.

WHERE: U.S. Geological Survey Headquarters, 12201 Sunrise Valley Drive, Reston, Va.

FOR MORE INFORMATION: Trudy Harlow at (703) 648-4483 or Butch Kinerney (703) 648-4732.

USGS real-time 1999 Drought Information is available at: http://md.water.usgs.gov/drought.
